## Description {#details}

This class implements a trivial dead store elimination.

We consider only the redundant stores that are local to a single Basic Block.

Definition at line 28 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/scalar/deadstoreelimination-h">DeadStoreElimination.h</a>.
